title: Couple With Heart Person Man

nouns: Represents a loving partnership and romantic union.

description: Represents a romantic couple composed of a person and a man, often signifying love, partnership, and strong affection between them.
apple_vendor_description: The couple with heart emoji featuring two men, as seen on Apple devices, is a beautiful illustration of love and partnership, characterized by Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and smooth, inviting gradients. Two male figures are shown embracing, with a radiant red heart positioned centrally, all illuminated by realistic lighting that emphasizes their rounded, friendly forms. This Apple-designed emoji powerfully symbolizes romantic love, commitment, and the joy of a shared life between two men, adding a touch of warmth and connection to digital communication.
